reviewText: Top Notch, This is a really good one. Probably the last one they will make as well, so get it while you can!

My 7 year old grandson has the whole collection of Land Before Time movies. He got this one for Christmas, and has already watched it 4 times. These movies teach values as well as entertain. I highly recommend it, and all the others!!!
I am glad to see great movies like this being made....  My son age 4 loves Land before Time...  I would like to see even more movies made like these!!  A+++
The dodo birds are really funny!!
great
love TLBT
My daughter loves land before time! And so do I. I grew up watching it. I got this for her 3rd birthday in July and won't be opening till then but I know we will love it. It came in very fast too.

I don't know why I waited so long to buy this series of DVD's!  My kids absolutely LOVE them.  I had never watched any of these when they first came out on VHS tapes, and am thoroughly enjoying watching all of them with my children.  If you don't have the Land Before Time series on DVD, you should get them & add them to your collection.

My kids love these series but I love them too. The characters are so cute and they are very entertaining.

My older handicapped daughter with a very young way of thinking loves itwatches over and over.  Only negative is a need for parents to limit reruns over strong objections.  I have watched some and find the movies engaging.  We think we have all the episodes and movies made of Land Before Time, so the repeats aren't too memorizable.

The quality of the DVD is fine. I'm tempted to make a movie review here. This is my least favorite of this series, because the guest characters are goofy. But it teaches the importance of being obedient to the wisdom of your elders while respecting others' right to choose.
Grandson loves it.
Quick delivery, no problems
This video is one young and old can enjoy. The series should be continued indefinitely. This film matches the quality of the best of animation.

Great family viewing that even I love to watch with my grandson. In fact, even my 17 year old grandson sits down and watches it with us. He remembers the original movies that we purchased on VHS when he was little.

Great movie that  Little Foot took it on his self to look after three new friends to teach them the rule like stay in a group or like petree says mom said so and all the friends stay together to the end.
My grandson loves The Land Before Time series, and this is to continue the collection. Plus he watches this movie every day.
Had a hard time on any recent moves about dinosaurs. While looking for these and she loves them! Would by again.
LAnd before time is an excellent series of stories with a message in everyone for children. Highly recommend for little ones and even some schildren school age and up.
This Movie is awesome.  I love it. Very great kids movie. Product was in excellent shape. Very impressed. I would def recommend this product.
Do not watch this, expecting anything more than it being so bad that it is comical.  They are like a bunch of wild hippies.  I suggest watching this straight after the very first movie.
I love this series, I grew up on it. I absolutely adore these movies I bought them all. Great for kids
I recommend this to anyone who has little kids.  I have the collection and when my kids were little they loved it.  I didn't know that they had 13 movies.  Great movie.

My kids have grown up with The Land Before Time series, I actually have a photo of my oldest sitting on Littlefoot's lap for a promotion of the first movie in 1989. Great story and morals. Not much of that coming out these days.
i got these dvd's for my grandson he loves them, they were his dad's favorite movies when he was young got them for a great price, will order again from this seller

My grandson is almost 3 and all we watch is Land Before Time movies. This is his favorite one. He calls it "The blue one and the pink one". It doesn't have the sad parts that he hates so much like the other movies. But he does get mad when the yellow bellies won't share the berries and eat them all up. I ordered with the regular (free) delivery and it was here in 3 days so unless you have a dinosaur emergency I wouldn't pay the extra shipping. The movies are great and the service is too.
I ordered this for my granddaugher as she wanted all of them. She just loves them. They are great movies for kids.

Wisdom of friends proved to be a very good one especially for my little 6 year old who is in grade 1 and having to deal with little friend issues. Gets funny sometimes but I like I said in a previous review about this series, it's age appropriate. Love it!

My granddaughter watched this series when she was about 5 years old. Today she is 15 and still loves to watch these movies. They are good , clean, funny and wonderful for any child to watch. I am a grandmother and I also still enjoy these movies.
Both of my grandchildren like this movie, but my grandson watches it over and over again. It has a great message. Its okay to be different.
Grandson loved it! Also entertained mom, grammy and his daddy! It will one that will be viewed over and over again.
Great DVD.
my grandson likes this movie but fall far short of the action and adventure provided in movie one and four in the set!
My kids, 6 & 3, love the whole Land Before Time series of movies. My daughter watches them all the time.
My son loves this series and i think this was a perfect ending to the series because it teaches kids some of the wisdoms. Dvd arrived in good time and condition was as promised.
said product was new wasn.t new had scratchs on disc still play won't buy from them item came fast. package ok

My only grandchild is a big fan of The Land Before Time. He has maybe 5 of the movies and TV shows and I AM SO TIRED OF WATCHING THE SAME FEW OVER AND OVER. so I bought us some new ones .I will have my daughter put them in his stocking all of them

My child brought the The Wisdom of Friends as a checkout from the library.  The disk was well-used, plenty of scratches and scuffs.  There's a reason for that.  Kids really like this movie and don't mind watching it over and over.  Once I saw it and realized what important lessons it was teaching my child, I had to buy a copy.  Well worth it, and I recommend watch it with your child at least once.

I was looking for a non-scary movie for my 2.5 yr old girl, beyond just Barney, Pooh and Tinkerbell.  I don't like this movie very much - Sarah one of the dinosaurs is negative and makes fun of the other dinosaurs and I don't want my daughter emulating her.  There is a few slightly scary parts with the T-Rexs that are chasing them, but seemed ok for my 2.5 year old.  If I have to watch a movie with my daughter, I would recommend Up or Tinkerbell first.
My four year old and three year old granddaughters love this DVD.  The birds in the movie are silly and cute and so are the dinosaurs.  There's a good story to be learned by the kids from this movie.
I purchased the video mainly to add to my collection - I didn't know there was another movie in the series. I was happy to find it.
All of the land before time are great movies I wish they would come out with some new ones, my little girl and i watch these movies together we call it a girls night out.

My daughter is way over the age of watching cartoons, but whenever she is home from school sick she still reaches for a Land Before Time movie.  We have been watching the danged things for years and still get a laugh out of them.  This is one of the two we didn't have and we enjoyed this one just as much as the others.  They are not nauseatingly sweet or overly simplistic.  They mix up the dino eras a bit, but it is easy to forgive them because the characters are really pretty timeless.

A good addition to my Land Before Time collection.  I enjoy positive movies, especially when teaching values to children.  They will be viewed over and over by great-grandchildren.  I hope many more episodes are in the works!

Silly and adorable. My 2 1/2 year old grandson loves this video. The T-Rex's might scare a tiny one if they are not already "into" dinosaurs. We watch it together so I am there to explain things. Great teachable moments.
Who doesn't like Little Foot. All kids need to be brought up on this series, it never gets old.

My daughter and I picked this up and watched it last night.  Ugh.  This is one of the worst movies I have ever seen and sorely regret buying it for my daughter.  The movie purports to be about little foot learning the "wisdoms" from his grandparents and then going on an adventure applying them, but instead it winds up mocking the idea of listening and thinking about what you're doing.  The comedic yellow-bellied dinos wind up providing a sort of praise for stupidity and debasement of the wisdoms.  It encourages children to ignore lessons of their parents and just do whatever feels good to them at the time.

To summarize the lessons this movie teaches: Kids, it's okay not to listen to your parents.  Feel free to wander off with any strange kids you meet in the neighborhood.  If you've been told not to do something, but it feels right at the moment, go ahead and do it anyway.  Parents don't know that much anyway.

The Land Before Time movies have always been a big hit with us. The stories have a message about caring for each other, being kind, accepting the differences of othere, etc. These messages are unobtrusive and neatly woven into the stories. Little Foot, Spike, Ducky,and Chomper are extremely likable and entertaining. The Wisdom of Friends didn't disappoint us even after seeing many other Land Before Time movies. While these are obviously made for younger children, they are excellent for all ages. I recommend this movie for anyone who likes sweet, g-rated stories.

I have seen all of the Land Before Time movies and I must admit that this is one of the better ones. Exellent message and good adventure. There are some genuine laugh out loud moments even for adults. It reminded me a lot of the original movie. A must see.
